dict.string: Full screen demo mode (shows device UI, not video only)
disable all CA layers (KB, titles, theme transition etc etc)
freeze edited assets (i.e. copy edited media local)
Load project video bin thumbnail strips async (performance)
Turn off Rasterization on Mica Titles when rendering 4K
Show "Easy Edit" button in the Videos Tab
Show Old Music Picker in Plugin
Show On Screen Play Button in Video Tab
Disable Logging Sandbox Paths in Console
Always show Startup Screen once on launch
add cache cleanup in delete project popup
No thumbnails tile update during playback
Use first fetched image for all thumbs
Plays only video in Trailers (and projects using Mica)
Don't use render file in fullScreen
Save temp iCloud files in Documents (iTunes)
Throttle CA Content's framerate (requires recreate composition)

array.string: All Frame Stats + logs every 100 frames

dict.string: Apply Vertical Blur to Portrait Clips
Show Mood alternate KB Effects (requires restart)
Parse Document folder for Extra Effects (requires restart)
Show Extra Motion Titles (add them to Document folder above)
Show Extra Motion Transitions (add them to Document folder above)
Replace Shipped templates with those in Documents folder (when filenames are equal)
Disable opaque background for Mood Transitions
Show Other Trim Ranges in Trimmer
Edit: Show Unplayable Assets in Picker
Do Not Prioritize Photos' Curation Assets
Use Pet Rect Instead of Pet Face
Enable Video Zoom / Move via Metadata
Break video at dropped frames (NOT recommended with Iris Video!)
Don't extend clips for Voice Ranges
Enable Zoom to Person on All Clips
Force Title Zoom on all clips

array.string: Only when there's voice and face

dict.string: Use Motion Titles Instead of New UI Titles
Use Poster Title Colors in Movie
Use Preset Strap Colors in Titles
Skip Title Duration / Transition pair logic
Albums use their own sorted order
Apply Pacing Ramps to Whole Edit
Trim to Song even with User-set Duration
Old Behavior on Debug Cell Tap
Use Bursts Scenes instead of Histogram
Don't Use Resource Files in Legacy iMovie Code
Show Exhaustive Lists per Mood in Pickers
Apply a Title to Every Clip
Don't Use Pick List for Scoring
Don't Use Pick List for Cloud Status
Append Readable PosterKey to stored images
Do Not Use Packed Wide Gamut
Transitions: Cuts and Cross Dissolves ONLY
Base N-Ups on UnionRect not Aspect
This file is only for use on build 1.4 (496) or later.
This item will only appear when this file is used on build 495 or earlier, and serves as a compatibility notice.
